attributes.action: Make Pat Condell Prime minister (youtube user http://uk.youtube.com/profile?user=patcondell)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pat Condell is a legend and is the best man for the top job of Prime Minister, we the undersigned petition the current Prime minister to stand down and elect Pat as his replacement

pats youtube account is located at http://uk.youtube.com/profile?user=patcondell

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
